references.reason: This paper provides a technical report on the GPT-4 model, which is a foundation for many of the LLMs used in this research on AI-driven scientific research.

references.paper_title: The claude 3 model family: Opus, sonnet, haiku
references.reason: This paper introduces the Claude 3 family of LLMs, which are relevant to this work because they are another family of LLMs used in this research on AI-driven scientific research.

references.paper_title: Researchagent: Iterative research idea generation over scientific literature with large language models
references.reason: This paper presents ResearchAgent, which is an AI agent that iteratively generates research ideas using LLMs and is directly relevant to the proposed DOLPHIN framework, which also uses LLMs for idea generation.

This paper offers a technical report on InternLM 2, another LLM model used in related work.  Its relevance stems from its contribution to the broader context of LLMs used in AI-driven scientific research.

references.paper_title: The AI Scientist: Towards Fully Automated Open-Ended Scientific Discovery
references.reason: This paper proposes AI-Scientist, a framework for open-ended auto-research, making it a highly relevant comparison and benchmark for the DOLPHIN framework proposed in this work.
